# solana-pda-finder
Computes PDA for the program + seed

## How to use
Paste this to your browser's address bar

    data:text/html;base64,

2. press Enter, add it to the bookmark bar (Ctrl + D)

### Example
#### Getting Metaplex metadata
1. Use programID: `metaqbxxUerdq28cj1RbAWkYQm3ybzjb6a8bt518x1s`
2. Use seed: `["metadata", [0x0b,0x70,0x65,0xb1,0xe3,0xd1,0x7c,0x45,0x38,0x9d,0x52,0x7f,0x6b,0x04,0xc3,0xcd,0x58,0xb8,0x6c,0x73,0x1a,0xa0,0xfd,0xb5,0x49,0xb6,0xd1,0xbc,0x03,0xf8,0x29,0x46], [0x19,0x4e,0xf0,0x43,0xbf,0xe7,0xfa,0xb5,0x0a,0x84,0xf1,0x2c,0x5f,0x76,0x97,0x0a,0xbd,0xe6,0xd1,0x9c,0x1a,0x92,0x42,0x09,0x46,0x79,0x55,0xf8,0x35,0x19,0x92,0xbd]]`, where the last list is a mint account address
